name: soft-boiled
effect: Heals the user for half its max HP.

flavor_text_entries.gold-silver:
Restores HP by 1/2
the user's max HP.
flavor_text_entries.crystal:
Restores HP by 1/2
the user's max HP.
flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Recovers up to half the
user’s maximum HP.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Recovers up to half the
user’s maximum HP.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
Heals the user by
up to half its full
HP. It can be used
to heal an ally.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The user restores
its own HP by up to
half of its max HP.
May be used in the
field to heal HP.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
The user restores its
own HP by up to half
of its maximum HP.
It may also be used
to heal an ally’s HP.
